name: Mahjong Emoji =)
description:
Cute Mahjong game made with Emojis.

The goal is to remove all the tiles from the board. You may remove only paired free tiles. The tile is free when there are no tiles either to the left or to the right from it.

Features:

- Hundred of levels, all of them unlocked and can be solved.
- Infinite Undo, Hints, Shuffle.
- Shadow: you decide to shade unplayable tiles.
- Change the layouts with de arrow buttons in the top of the game.
- Don’t need wifi.
- There is no in-app purchases.
- You can skip any level any time
- Different difficulties and boards
- Clean interface
- Designed for tablets and phones


Emoji icons supplied by EmojiOne: https://www.emojione.com/
